results.title: [Effects of calcium antagonists or beta-blockade on left ventricular diastolic function in essential hypertension].
results.text_hl: This study was performed to assess the effect of a @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ channel blocker (@CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@) and beta-blockade (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) on left ventricular early diastolic function and filling in @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Prodromal_Symptoms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D062706 @@@WHO stage I@@@, @DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@; @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HT@@@).

citations.NLM: Shiotani M, Arita M, Nakatsu C, Nakamura N, Ohshika H, Nakamura Y, Fujiwara S, Ueno Y, Nishio I, Masuyama Y. [Effects of calcium antagonists or beta-blockade on left ventricular diastolic function in essential hypertension]. J Cardiol. 1990;20(1):135-45. PMID: 2093746
